title: 03/19/21 DPS Hour 1 Peter King
itunes:title: 03/19/21 DPS Hour 1 Peter King
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, Dan and company discuss the sexual misconduct allegations surrounding Houston Texan quarterback Deshaun Watson. Peter King of NBCSports.com and "Football Morning In America" joins to add his perspective and insight on the allegations surrounding Watson. Also, Dan whips up plenty of NCAA Tournament bracket chatter.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
